sentences.sContent: Let’s pretend we’re on the moon.
sentences.sCn: 我们假装自己是在月球上吧。

sentences.sContent: He’s not asleep – he’s just pretending.
sentences.sCn: 他并没睡着，不过是装睡而已。

sentences.sContent: To pretend ignorance of the situation would be irresponsible.
sentences.sCn: 装作不知情是不负责任的做法。

sentences.sContent: I can’t marry her and to pretend otherwise would be wrong.
sentences.sCn: 我不可以娶她，装作娶她无妨是不对的。

remMethod.val: pre(预先)+tend(趋向)→预先就有了趋向→假装

words.tran: 借口；虚假；炫耀；自吹（等于pretence）
冒牌者；妄求者；妄提要求者
假装（pretend的过去式和过去分词）；装扮

trans.tranOther: to behave as if something is true when in fact you know it is not, in order to deceive people or for fun
imaginary or not real - used especially by children
